If a bus leaves Lusaka at 07:30 and arrives in Livingstone at 13:15, how long was the journey?
questions.explanation: From 07:30 to 13:15 is 5 hours and 45 minutes

questions.explanation: Each number is multiplied by 2 (5×2=10, 10×2=20, etc.)

questions.question: If a box contains 144 pencils and is shared equally among 12 learners, how many pencils does each get?
A shopkeeper bought 50 crates of soda at 80 Kwacha each and sold them at 95 Kwacha each. What was the total profit?
questions.explanation: Profit per crate = 95 - 80 = 15. Total profit = 50 × 15 = 750 Kwacha

If 5 workers can complete a job in 8 days, how many days would 10 workers take?
questions.explanation: More workers means less time. 5 × 8 = 40 worker-days. 40 ÷ 10 = 4 days
